replacementdef.replacementvalue: <autogen>__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::SPACE, KeyCode::VK_MODIFIER_HAPPY_SUPER</autogen> <block> <modifier_only>ModifierFlag::HAPPY_SUPER</modifier_only> <autogen>__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::Y, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT, KeyCode::FORWARD_DELETE, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_OPTION</autogen> <autogen>__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::Y, KeyCode::DELETE, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_OPTION</autogen> <autogen>__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::N, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT, KeyCode::DELETE, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_OPTION</autogen> <autogen>__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::N, KeyCode::FORWARD_DELETE, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_OPTION</autogen> <autogen>__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::H, KeyCode::CURSOR_UP, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT, VK_COMMAND, KeyCode::RETURN</autogen> </block> <block> <autogen>__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::Y, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT, KeyCode::FORWARD_DELETE</autogen> <autogen>__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::Y, KeyCode::DELETE</autogen> <autogen>__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::N, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT, KeyCode::DELETE</autogen> <autogen>__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::N, KeyCode::FORWARD_DELETE</autogen> <autogen>__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::H, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT, VK_COMMAND, KeyCode::RETURN</autogen> <autogen>__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::H, KeyCode::RETURN</autogen> </block>

vkopenurldef.name: KeyCode::VK_OPEN_URL_SHELL_BUFFER_RANDOM_STRING
vkopenurldef.url: cat /dev/urandom | env LC_CTYPE=C tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 32 | head -n 1 | /usr/bin/pbcopy
